title: Call of Duty: Mobile
description: COD Mobile delivers console-quality FPS gameplay with iconic maps, operators, and weapons in a mobile-friendly experience.

title: Clash of Clans
description: Build your village, raise a clan, and compete in epic Clan Wars in this all-time favorite strategy game.

title: Genshin Impact
description: Explore the fantasy world of Teyvat, harness elemental powers, and embark on epic adventures across stunning landscapes.

title: Minecraft
description: Build, explore, and survive in a blocky, procedurally generated world filled with adventure and creativity.

title: Candy Crush Saga
description: Match colorful candies and solve hundreds of fun, challenging puzzles in this iconic match-3 game.
